code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var stateSlice=createSlice({name:'quickPanel/state',initialState:false,reducers:{toggleQuickPanel:function toggleQuickPanel(state,action){return!state;},openQuickPanel:function openQuickPanel(state,action){return true;},closeQuickPanel:function closeQuickPanel(state,action){return false;}}});var _stateSlice$actions=stateSlice.actions,toggleQuickPanel=_stateSlice$actions.toggleQuickPanel,openQuickPanel=_stateSlice$actions.openQuickPanel,closeQuickPanel=_stateSlice$actions.closeQuickPanel;export{toggleQuickPanel,openQuickPanel,closeQuickPanel};export default stateSlice.reducer;
